subject: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO -U.S.A
  Date: 29/ 12/ 2023
  WNB-Ohio-U.S.A/information on fund transfer US$17,500,000.00
  Dear Beneficiary
  Note MR ERIC FRANK ROSSER have visited my office with a Change of
  Ownership Documents MR ERIC FRANK ROSSER has stated to me that due to
  your lack of understanding and negative thought makes you not to
  achieve your dream to success in life with access of this
  US$17.5Million and his brother to my office proofing that your
  negative thought make you take decision to allow him to claim the fund
  since you don,t want to send the US$50
  You are hereby advice to forward a declaration letter to my office
  immediately Today Tuesday being 19th of December 2023 stating that you
  are no more interested in making this claim of your US$17.5Million
  which Transfer Account Login password is ready to forward to you as
  soon as you do your possibility to send the required fee as directed
  below without any mistake .
  MR ERIC FRANK ROSSER will claim the funds on your behalf and Mr. Eric
  Frank Rosser have proof that you have decided to delay this official
  transfer of this funds US$17.5Million into your nominated bank account
  without any inspection and also not to send the Fee because of your
  negative thought.
  Did you finally agree and sign any Deed of Assignment in favor of (Mr.
  Eric Franklin Rosser) for CHANGE OF OWNERSHIP in your Name and thereby
  making him the current beneficiary with this following of : MR. ERIC
  F. ROSSER.
  Finally, I will not be hold responsible if you allow Mr. Eric Franklin
  Rosser to claim your fund because of your delay and negative thought
  to secure your fund which is ready to be in your possession as soon as
  you update me with payment information as directed below now without
  any explanation or delay from your side because I will not accept any
  delay from you.
 
 I officially wait for the Attached Copy of the $50 ITUNES CARD OR
  SATEM WALLET Slip Information Scan for Recorded of your Funds delivery
  to be made immediately.
  Your immediate compliance will be in your very best interest.
  Thank you for choosing our real time online banking.
  Yours sincerely,
  Cathleen (Cathy) Nash CEO
  Chairman, Chief Executive Officer,
  Chief Executive Officer of Wood forest National Bank
  And Director of Wood forest National Bank.

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Hello Cathleen Cathy Nash,

Thank you for your email. I must say, it's quite a surprise to hear about this situation involving Mr. Eric Frank Rosser. I don't recall having any interactions with him or signing any documents in his favor.

Could you please provide more details about this fund transfer? How did my name get associated with it? And what exactly is the fee that you're referring to?

I'm sorry if I seem confused, but I just want to make sure I understand everything correctly before making any decisions.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Good afternoon I just receive your email about your funds that is in our
office for a few months now and I will give you everything details of the
funds the funds once you send the needed fee for renew all the documents
cover the funds that is very important first

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Good afternoon! I'm so glad to hear from you. It's quite surprising to know that there are funds in your office under my name. Could you please provide me with more details about these funds? How did they end up there? And what kind of documents are needed to cover the funds? Also, could you explain why a fee is required for renewing these documents?

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
I receive your email and I want you to know that the document need for this
funds is ownership certificate and insurance certificate and IMF funds
release order certificate and it is going to cost you $500

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for your email. I appreciate the information about the necessary documents for fund release. It's interesting to know that ownership, insurance, and an IMF funds release order are required.

Could you please provide more details about these documents? For instance, what exactly does the ownership document entail? And how does one go about obtaining an IMF funds release order?

Also, could you clarify what costs are associated with obtaining these documents? Is there a standard fee or does it vary depending on certain factors?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Thank you for your email please I want you to let you know that these
necessary documents is me that going to obtain the documents for once you
send the needed fee of $500 and after that the only fee you are going to
pay again is transfer fee which I don't know the amount for now

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your email and the information provided. I appreciate your assistance in this matter. However, I'm a bit confused about the process you've outlined. Could you please clarify what these necessary documents are? And why is there a fee involved? 

Also, could you provide more details about the transfer fee? It would be helpful to understand all the costs involved upfront.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
those documents is  to show that the funds is legit and approved by the
government for the transfer fee is going to cost you $1500 so the total
amount you are going to pay is $2,000.00 USD dollars

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Hello there,

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's interesting to know that the funds are approved by the government. Could you please explain a bit more about how this process works? And why is there a transfer fee involved? I'm just trying to understand everything clearly.

Looking forward to your response!

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
Yes for the process the funds will transfer into your personal bank account
and transfer fee will be paid by the ownership of the funds which is you so
please now I want you to try understand me and also send me your bank
account details and your home address and phone number

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
This account bank details I need from you

BANK NAME -

NAME ON ACCOUNT -

ACCOUNT NUMBER -

ROUTINE NUMBER -

SWIFT CODE -

BANK ADDRESS -

YOUR HOME ADDRESS -

YOUR PHONE NUMBER -

body:

I must say, that's quite a list of information you're asking for. Can you tell me more about why you need all these details? I'm just curious and would love to understand better.

Best wishes,
Barbara

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO
body:
These information is where I will transfer the funds for you once after you
send the total amount of $2,000.00

body:

subject: Re: WOOD-FOREST NATIONAL BANK OHIO

Thank you for sharing this information with me. It's quite interesting to learn about the document being an ownership and IMF funds release order.
